üîç Keyword Multi-Search Pro - Your Ultimate Research Companion

Hey there! üëã 

Ever wished you could search a keyword everywhere at once? Now you can!

This Chrome extension is like having a research assistant that works at lightning speed. Just select any text, click once, and watch as all your favorite research tools open instantly.

Think about it:
‚Ä¢ No more copying and pasting the same keyword over and over
‚Ä¢ No more manually opening dozens of tabs
‚Ä¢ No more switching between different tools

Whether you're checking SEO metrics, researching domains, or analyzing market trends - we've got you covered. One click, all the data you need.

Save hours every day. Work smarter, not harder. 

Ready to transform your research workflow? Let's get started! 

KEY FEATURES:
‚ú® One-Click Multi-Platform Search
- Select any text on any webpage
- Use keyboard shortcut or right-click menu
- Instantly open searches across all your configured tools
- Perfect for SEO research, domain checking, and market analysis

üõ†Ô∏è Fully Customizable Research Suite
- Pre-configured with popular SEO tools
- Add any search engine or research platform
- Support for multiple keyword formats
- Flexible URL templating system

‚ö° Advanced Keyword Processing
- Use original keywords: {keyword}
- Remove spaces: {keyword:nospace}
- Convert to lowercase: {keyword:lowercase}
- Convert to uppercase: {keyword:uppercase}
- Domain variations: {keyword:nospace.com}, {keyword:nospace.net}, etc.

üíº Perfect for:
‚Ä¢ SEO Professionals
‚Ä¢ Digital Marketers
‚Ä¢ Content Strategists
‚Ä¢ Domain Investors
‚Ä¢ Market Researchers
‚Ä¢ Competitive Analysts

üéØ Use Cases:
1. SEO Research

2. Domain Research

- Domain authority analysis

3. Market Analysis

‚öôÔ∏è Easy Setup:
1. Install the extension
2. Configure your preferred search URLs
3. Set up keyboard shortcut (recommended: Alt+K or Cmd+K)
4. Start researching!

üöÄ Boost Your Productivity:
- Save hours on manual searches
- Streamline your research workflow
- Get comprehensive insights faster
- Make better data-driven decisions

üí° Pro Tips:
‚Ä¢ Add your most-used tools first

Free to use and constantly improving!
